features: Quiet & Strong Wind Personal Fan: This small fan is inbuilt with a brand new copper-made motor that is powerful enough to support the blade running at a very high speed to produce strong wind. The wind is strong enough to cool you down quickly. And This small fan uses an optimized motor to reach the quiet noise without disturbing others.

Portable Handheld Fan with 3 Wind Speed Adjustable: The mini fan has adjustable wind speeds; you can press the power button to change the wind setting (Low, Medium, High, Stop). You need to adjust it as your need when you are outside.

Personal Fan with Rechargeable Battery: The personal fan use upgraded rechargeable 2000mAh battery power. This portable handheld fan is charged by USB devices such as power banks, computers, car chargers, and USB chargers, which can continue working when connecting with a USB power supply (The package doesn't include the adapter).

Creative Designed Lash Fan: This mini fan was designed like an eye; it is the best makeup gift. You can easily keep this mini handheld fan in your bag and go with you to the office, on the go, hiking, camping, or at home, so you can use it whenever you want.

Easy to Hold: This eyelash fan is designed with an anti-slip handle that conforms to ergonomic principles; It's the best gift for summer. Also, we provide 365 days warranty and free online customer service. We promise to answer within 24 hours.
body.description: 2000mAh Portable Small Handheld Fan Brushless Motor The engine of this hand held fan can reach 3000-4000 rpm, and it is a small handheld fan with low noise and with a powerful portable fan. This personal fan with a 2000mAh battery, you can use it when you are at home, office, traveling, camping, and outdoors. Warning Tips: 1. This hand fan is without an adapter but has a USB cord. 2. This handheld fan needs a 5V 1A charger, which must be under 5V & 1A. If you use an above 5V or 1A charger to charge it, the motor will be burned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality puts out a lot of air, it is quiet and easy to hold and use. Battery lasts too.
reviews.reviewText: My girl asked for a small fan to carry in her backpack while playing sports. I found this one with a nice design and good specs and decided to give this one a try. I was not disappointed; this one has worked out great. First off, very easy to use. One button powers on the off, and then each additional press changes the speeds, it has three speeds, and then off. It also has an easy-to-find USB cable connector on the side too. Secondly, it works great. I like how the fan puts out a good amount of air on low and then really puts out the air on medium and high. In addition to the high airflow, the sound level is low, and my girl is so happy about that because she does not want to distract others when using it. Lastly, I like how it stays charged for a long time and hours, and my girl has not run out of use with it. She basically plugs it in when she gets home, and it is always charged for use. No cons, it really worked out great for us, and I am very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable Handheld Fan
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I made a recent purchase of this compact personal fan, and it has quickly become one of the most important things in my bag. Permit me to share some of my honest experiences and opinions with regard to this incredible piece of equipment. To begin, the fact that this portable fan can be moved from place to place is a major advantage. Because it is not only small but also lightweight, it is very simple for me to transport it wherever I go. This fan is easy to pack away in either my backpack or even my pocket, so I can take it with me everywhere I go, whether I'm strolling in the woods, discovering a lively city, or unwinding on the beach. The innovative addition of the lanyard enables me to hang the item from either my bag or my wrist so that I can reach it easily at any time. The fact that the battery can be recharged is a huge benefit for me. I can use the fan for many hours on a single charge, making it an ideal accessory for day excursions and other activities that take place outside. Recharging the fan from a power bank, laptop, or any other USB port is made simple by the inclusion of a USB charging cable in the package. Because of this, I don't have to worry about regularly changing the batteries; therefore, selecting this option is good for the environment. This portable fan is quite convenient, and I like that it has three different speed settings. The settings on the fan may be adjusted to meet my requirements for a little breeze, moderate airflow, or stronger airflow so that I can feel more comfortable. The high-speed option is great for providing rapid relief on very warm days, while the low-speed setting is ideal for preserving battery life on extended car rides. The operation of the fan is quite quiet, which ensures that it will not disrupt the peace and quiet of the locations that I frequent.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect , Great product!!
reviews.reviewText: Very powerful for its size and the speeds are def​inately a great feature. Not too noisy. ​Fits perfectly in a bag​.The perfect , useful handheld fan and small enough ​to use it everywhere.V​ery handy to have one of these very satisfied with my purchase!!Portable, easy to charge, and battery lasts a long time! it’s also pretty strong,Delivery was fast too .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my niece when we went to Cedar Point because I knew she was gonna be extra hot and being she's so young I wasn't sure if she would be able to tell me if she was super hot so I made sure she had this fan at all times. This fan easily charges with my phone charger and that it doesn't come with them be cause it dies but in case I ever lose the charge. I also have an extra spare which is nice. It has different levels, so you don't have to choose it on the highest level. You can choose medium or low so that way. It's not so high in their face, but if they're older, they can obviously choose their own levels without issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was hesitant at first when I bought it due to the lack of reviews, but I love it.
reviews.reviewText: I’m happy with the product, it is strong once you get to level 3; but not strong enough to be annoying. Also it’s nice to cool me down during this heat wave in my state that is not usually this hot, and though I’m used to it; they’re are times I needed to cool down a bit. This helps a lot, especially since in my house we don’t exactly have a a/c or central heating n cooling; and this is my only way to cool down (aside from drinking water and staying hydrated). I highly recommend this product, and it’s convenient for everywhere you go; because it is small enough to fit in a big. Definitely worth the price, but definitely try to get it when there is a sale or discount; and if you can use a bit of your points to make it cheaper. I love it so much!!
